mdRecord.dcterms:title: Republican Party of Virginia meets in Roanoke, Va.; former Congressman William C. Wampler speaks on President Eisenhower
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Republican Party of Virginia holds a convention at the Hotel Roanoke in Roanoke, Va. Party Chairman Floyd Landreth announces his retirement and Roanoke City Republican Committee Chair Hazel Barger gives an address, welcoming Lester Parsons and I. Lee Potter as candidates to succeed Landreth. William C. Wampler, former United States Representative for Virginia's ninth congressional district, addresses the audience regarding President Dwight Eisenhower's policies on conflict, expressing confidence and pride in Eisenhower's leadership.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Republican Party (Va.)
Eisenhower, Dwight D. (Dwight David), 1890-1969
